factions.name: France
additionalRules: Culture of Expeditionary Warfare: All HQ and Platoon Leaders must be taken as Veterans, including Vehicles being given the Command Rule or having the Command Rule when taken as your Armored Platoon Commander.
French Foreign Legion: Any unit in this army can be fielded as French Foreign Legion, gaining the 'Marche ou Cr√®ve' Special Rule.
Honneur et Patrie: French Army Infantry Units get a +1 to their Morale Rating when taking a Morale Test if any other French Army Infantry Unit is is within 8in.

platoons.name: HQ Platoon
platoons.specialText:
Company Commander: 0 - 1
 Chaplain: 0 - 1
 Company Commander Transport: 0 - 1

platoons.name: Rifle Platoon
platoons.specialText:
Platoon Commander: 1
 Infantry Squads (Not-Eng): 2
 Infantry Squads (Not-Eng): 0-2
 Medic: 0-1
 FAO (Arty or Air): 0-1
 Sniper: 0-1
 AT Team: 0-1
 Light Mortar: 0-1
 Transport: Per Unit in the Platoon

platoons.name: Recce Platoon
platoons.specialText:
Platoon Commander: 1
 Infantry Squads (Not-Eng): 1
 Infantry Squads (Not-Eng): 0-3
 FAO (Arty or Air): 0-1
 AT Team: 0-1
 Transport: Enough so that every soldier in the platoon may ride. Transports have Recce.

platoons.name: Engineer Platoon
platoons.specialText:
Platoon Commander: 1
 Engineer Squads: 2
 Engineer Squads: 0-2
 Flame Thrower Teams: 0-3
 Transport: Per Unit in the Platoon

platoons.name: Heavy Weapons Platoon
platoons.specialText:
Platoon Commander: 1
 MG or Mortar Team (Any Mix): 2
 Mortar Teams: 0-3
 MG Teams: 0-3
 AT Teams: 0-3
 Transport: Per Unit in the Platoon

platoons.name: Artillery Platoon
platoons.specialText:
Platoon Commander: 1
 Field Artillery/AA Gun/AT Gun: 1
 Field Artillery/AA Gun/AT Gun (Any Mix): 0-3
 Transport: Per Unit in the Platoon

platoons.name: Fortifications and Defenses
platoons.specialText: These are optional rules under the Fortifications Section of the Bolt Action 3rd Edition Rulebook on Pg.296; Not for Events unless stated in the packet or by the TO.

platoons.name: Air Support
platoons.specialText:
These are optional experimental rules from the Bolt Action Community website. Not for Events unless stated in the packet or by the TO.
 Aircraft: 1
